title: Hush (1998) Gwyneth Paltrow + Johnathon Schaech (En-Fr subs)
description:
aka Bloodline (1998) (USA working title)  <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118744/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118744/</a>

Optional English and French? subtitles in separate idx/sub files.

With Jessica Lange

Jackson invites his girlfriend home to his ranch, where his mother starts to reveal less pleasant sides as an old and dark family secret is disclosed.

This is not my rip, I found it on the net using Piratebay's tracker, so I think it should be found here.

WARNING: The ripper has chosen some fancy codec and other settings that is not tolerated by either of my two standalone DivX players. Convert the file with Dr. DivX or ConvertXtoDVD if you have to. The file plays normally in WMP on my computer with the English subtitles. I have not been able to confirm that the French subtitles are included.

DVDrip Widescreen 688x382, good stereo.
